file_content.text: Thank you for your assistance.
I have the recording for you, agent.
Excellent. Our technicians will begin processing the recording immediately.
This intelligence could turn the tide of battles across the galaxy. We greatly appreciate your assistance in acquiring it.
It was simple, really.
It was skillfully done, to be sure.
I thought it would be harder.
I'm glad the task met with your satisfaction.
If you'll excuse me, I have a great deal to do now. Thank you again for your participation.
We're done here, yes?
Yes. I humbly thank you for your time.
Good day.
Best of luck.
Copy. Asset has approached--commencing with recruitment.
Copy. Assets approaching--commencing now.
Good day, my lord. It's an honor to speak with you on behalf of Imperial Intelligence.
Greetings. Imperial Intelligence requires a moment of your time to discuss a lucrative proposition.
Agent. The local Intelligence branch would like to request your immediate assistance.
We need you for an important surveillance operation. If successful, we stand to gain a wealth of intelligence on the Republic's war efforts.
Of course.
I'll hear you out.
The pay will be generous. The plan is simple.
Why me?
Our records indicate that you are trustworthy and up to the task.
Is this actually important?
I assure you, the task is vital.
We want you to take this audio surveillance device, locate a Republic official named Girr Antoc, and engage him in conversation.
We have created a cover identity that establishes you as a potential defector to the Republic. A meeting with Antoc has already been arranged.
The surveillance device will record everything that's said, allowing us to reproduce Antoc's non-human vocal patterns and gain access to the Republic's encrypted files.
Consider it done.
That's it?
None of our agents here would be able to "sell" this particular cover story as well as you can.
Good luck. We'll look forward to seeing you again shortly.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Hmm... very well. I thank you for your time.
So much to do, so much to do....
